title: Cultivate Your Own Edamame: A Guide to Growing and Enjoying Soybeans!

tasks.task: Growing soybeans in a garden setting.
subtasks: Preparing soil mix for seedling transplantation.
Planting soybean seeds or transplanting seedlings.
Dealing with pest infestations (caterpillars, spider mites) and fungal diseases (rust) using neem oil applications.
Harvesting soybean pods when they mature.
Removing the plants after pod production ceases.
Composting or disposing of plant material.
Opening soybean pods to reveal edamame beans.
Cooking edamame using an air fryer with oil and salt.
Enjoying the harvested edamame as a tasty snack.
